results.content:
I am just over halfway through the course. You will learn a lot in this course if you stick with it. Two things I really liked was the introduction to the generator as I have never used one before. This saves a TON of time. Also he showed how to setup data tables so far.

I was a little turned off at first because he makes a lot of mistakes and does not edit them out of the video, but I now understand his logic behind that ( you will learn how to correct your errors).

One last thing I wish he would do in future courses is turn of his phone or whatever ( it has rang several times during the course so far), and also turn of his email notifications that keep popping up on the screen. While this may be nitpicking it would make his courses all that more professional.
results.content_html:
